lambda.Author: Charl Potgieter
lambda.Description: Returns an array of month ends between start and end dates
lambda.PipeDelimitedParameterAndDescription: DateStart|First of month sequence| DateEnd|Last month of sequence
lambda.RefersTo: =LAMBDA(range1,range2, LET( RowsRng1, ROWS(range1), RowsTotal, ROWS(range1) + ROWS(range2), Seq,SEQUENCE(RowsTotal), IF( Seq<=RowsRng1, INDEX(range1, Seq), INDEX(range2, Seq-RowsRng1) ) ) )
